languages.text: "Это отвратительно. Я не хочу никаких постановочных "благодарителей". Позвольте простым жителям Райкада Минорис обратиться ко мне, или не устраивайте фарс вовсе!"
"This is disgusting. I do not want a staged show of 'gratitude.' Allow the ordinary people of Rykad Minoris to speak to me or skip this farce altogether!"
languages.original_text: "Это отвратительно. Я не хочу никаких постановочных "благодарителей". Позвольте простым жителям Райкада Минорис обратиться ко мне, или не устраивайте фарс вовсе!"

traits.locale_text: "This is disgusting. I don't want a staged show of gratitude. Allow the ordinary people of Rykad Minoris to speak to me or skip that farce altogether!"
"This is disgusting. I don't want a staged show of gratitude. Allow the ordinary people of Rykad Minoris to speak to me or skip that farce altogether!"
"This is disgusting. I don't want a staged show of 'gratitude'. Allow the ordinary people of Rykad Minoris to speak to me or skip that farce altogether!"
"This is disgusting. I don't want a staged show of 'gratitude'. Allow the ordinary people of Rykad Minoris to speak to me or skip that farce altogether!"
"This is disgusting. I do not want a staged show of 'gratitude.' Allow the ordinary people of Rykad Minoris to speak to me or skip this farce altogether!"
"This is disgusting. I do not want a staged show of 'gratitude.' Allow the ordinary people of Rykad Minoris to speak to me or skip this farce altogether!"

languages.text: "Das ist ja widerwärtig. Ich will kein inszeniertes Spektakel der 'Dankbarkeit'. Gestattet den einfachen Bewohnern von Rykad Minoris, mit mir zu sprechen, oder lasst diese Farce vollständig bleiben!"
languages.original_text: "This is disgusting. I do not want a staged show of 'gratitude.' Allow the ordinary people of Rykad Minoris to speak to me or skip this farce altogether!"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ja widerwärtig. Ich will kein inszeniertes Spektakel der 'Dankbarkeit'. Gestattet den einfachen Bewohnern von Rykad Minoris, mit mir zu sprechen, oder lasst diese Farce vollständig bleiben!"

languages.text: « C'est scandaleux. Je ne veux pas d'une mise en scène de "gratitude". Laissez les gens ordinaires de Rykad Minoris s'adresser à moi ou faites une croix sur cette farce ! »
languages.original_text: "This is disgusting. I do not want a staged show of 'gratitude.' Allow the ordinary people of Rykad Minoris to speak to me or skip this farce altogether!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est scandaleux. Je ne veux pas d'une mise en scène de "gratitude". Laissez les gens ordinaires de Rykad Minoris s'adresser à moi ou faites une croix sur cette farce ! »

languages.text: “这真是令人恶心。我不想要什么做作的‘感激’环节。必须保证小莱卡德的普通人能和我说话，否则这场闹剧就算了吧！”
languages.original_text: "This is disgusting. I do not want a staged show of 'gratitude.' Allow the ordinary people of Rykad Minoris to speak to me or skip this farce altogether!"

traits.locale_text: “这真是令人恶心。我不想要什么做作的‘感激’环节。必须保证小莱卡德的普通人能和我说话，否则这场闹剧就算了吧！”

languages.text: 「嫌気が差す。'感謝'が演出されたショーなど望むものか。ライカド・ミノリスの一般市民が話しかけてくるようにするか、その茶番劇はなしにしてくれ！」
languages.original_text: "This is disgusting. I do not want a staged show of 'gratitude.' Allow the ordinary people of Rykad Minoris to speak to me or skip this farce altogether!"

traits.locale_text: 「嫌気が差す。'感謝'が演出されたショーなど望むものか。ライカド・ミノリスの一般市民が話しかけてくるようにするか、その茶番劇はなしにしてくれ！」

languages.text: «Es repugnante. No quiero una muestra de "gratitud". ¡Deje que la gente corriente de Rykad Minoris hable conmigo o sáltese esa farsa por completo!».
languages.original_text: "This is disgusting. I do not want a staged show of 'gratitude.' Allow the ordinary people of Rykad Minoris to speak to me or skip this farce altogether!"

traits.locale_text: «Es repugnante. No quiero una muestra de "gratitud". ¡Deje que la gente corriente de Rykad Minoris hable conmigo o sáltese esa farsa por completo!».

languages.text: "Rezalet. Sahnelenmiş 'minnet' gösterileri lazım değil bana. Bırakın Rykad Minoris'in sıradan halkı karşıma geçip konuşsun ya da bu soytarılık başlamadan bitsin!"
languages.original_text: "This is disgusting. I do not want a staged show of 'gratitude.' Allow the ordinary people of Rykad Minoris to speak to me or skip this farce altogether!"

traits.locale_text: "Rezalet. Sahte minnettarlıklarını böyle göstermeleri hoş değil. Rykad Minoris'in sıradan halkı gelsin ve konuşsun, aksi takdirde tören hiç yapılmasın!"
